# loc

Access [Library of Congress](https://chroniclingamerica.loc.gov) from R.

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("news-r/loc")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(loc)

# titles
titles <- loc_search_titles("michigan", pages = 2)

# pages
pages <- loc_search_pages("Thomas Paine")
```
